Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Overview: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

Title: La La Land
Overview: A jazz pianist falls for an aspiring actress in Los Angeles, grappling with their dreams and the toll they take on their relationship.

Title: Mad Max: Fury Road
Overview: In a post-apocalyptic desert wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler to save a group of female prisoners.

Title: Parasite
Overview: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family, becoming entangled in an unexpected incident.

Title: Interstellar
Overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Title: Arrival
Overview: A linguist is recruited by the military to communicate with extraterrestrial life forms that have arrived on Earth.

Title: Joker
Overview: A failed stand-up comedian descends into madness and becomes a psycho-killer-clown, inciting a violent revolution in Gotham City.

Title: Spotlight
Overview: The true story of the Boston Globe's investigation into child abuse by Catholic priests.

Title: The Shape of Water
Overview: A lonely, mute cleaning woman in a high-security lab forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature held captive.

Title: Get Out
Overview: A young black photographer visits his white girlfriend's parents' house, where he uncovers a disturbing secret.

Title: Dunkirk
Overview: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire, and France are surrounded by the German army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

Title: Toy Story 4
Overview: Woody, Buzz, and the gang embark on a road trip with a new craft-project-turned-toy, Forky, and face an adventure that shows Woody his destiny.

Title: Blade Runner 2049
Overview: A young blade runner uncovers a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge society into chaos.

Title: The Social Network
Overview: The story of the founding of Facebook and the ensuing legal battles.

Title: Whiplash
Overview: A young jazz drummer enrolls in a cutthroat music conservatory and is pushed to the edge by his abusive instructor.

Title: Gravity
Overview: Two astronauts are stranded in space after their shuttle is destroyed, fighting for survival.

Title: Birdman
Overview: A washed-up actor, famous for playing an iconic superhero, tries to reclaim his fame by staging a Broadway play.

Title: The Revenant
Overview: A frontiersman on a fur trapping expedition fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead.

Title: Inside Out
Overview: Riley's emotions—Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness—struggle to guide her through a difficult life transition.

Title: Her
Overview: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an advanced operating system designed to meet his every need.

Title: Coco
Overview: A young boy who dreams of becoming a musician travels to the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather.

Title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
Overview: A mother challenges the local police chief to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to find a culprit.
Two young British soldiers are given a seemingly impossible mission to deliver a message across enemy territory.

Title: Call Me By Your Name
Overview: In 1980s Italy, a romance blossoms between an adolescent boy and his father's older, temporary assistant.

Title: Black Panther
Overview: T'Challa returns home to the isolated, technologically advanced African nation of Wakanda to take his place as king.

Title: A Star Is Born
Overview: A musician helps a young singer/actress find fame as alcoholism and age cause his own career to spiral downward.

Title: The Martian
Overview: An astronaut is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew on Mars, where he must find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

Title: Room
Overview: A mother and her young son finally gain freedom after being held captive in a small, windowless room for years.

Title: Manchester by the Sea
Overview: A man is forced to confront his past when he returns to his hometown to care for his nephew after his brother's death.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Overview: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, but soon meets five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat to all realities.

Title: Phantom Thread
Overview: A renowned dressmaker in 1950s London has his carefully tailored life disrupted by a young, strong-willed woman who becomes his muse and lover.

Title: Lady Bird
Overview: An artistic teenager comes of age in Sacramento, navigating her turbulent relationship with her mother and dreams of moving to a city with culture.

Title: No Country for Old Men
Overview: A hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong, takes the money, and is relentlessly pursued by a psychopathic killer.

Title: The Dark Knight
Overview: Batman is pushed to his limits by the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to plunge Gotham into anarchy.

Title: Inception
Overview: A skilled thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into a target's mind.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Title: Forrest Gump
Overview: The life story of an Alabama man with a low IQ who unwittingly influences several defining historical events in the 20th century.

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Overview: A young FBI cadet must seek the advice of an incarcerated cannibalistic killer to catch another serial killer who skins his victims.

Title: Schindler's List
Overview: A German businessman saves the lives of more than a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

Title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Overview: A man undergoes a procedure to erase the memories of his ex-girlfriend after their painful breakup.

Title: Spirited Away
Overview: A 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, where humans are changed into beasts.

Title: The Matrix
Overview: A computer programmer discovers that humanity is secretly trapped in a simulated reality called the Matrix.

Title: Gladiator
Overview: A Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's ambitious son, leading him to seek revenge as a gladiator.

Title: The Departed
Overview: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force try to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang.

Title: Million Dollar Baby
Overview: A boxing trainer takes on an amateur boxer as a protégé, forming a deep and complicated bond.

Title: Inglourious Basterds
Overview: A group of Jewish-American soldiers are tasked with assassinating Nazi leaders in France during World War II.

Title: Prisoners
Overview: When his daughter and her friend go missing, a father clashes with a detective assigned to the case.

Title: Drive
Overview: A Hollywood stuntman who moonlights as a getaway driver finds himself in trouble after a heist goes wrong.

Title: Rush
Overview: The rivalry between Formula 1 drivers James Hunt and Niki Lauda during the 1970s.

Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
Overview: The true story of New York stockbroker Jordan Belfort, his rise to a wealthy lifestyle, and subsequent downfall.

Title: Fargo
Overview: A pregnant police chief investigates a series of homicides connected to a desperate car salesman's scheme.

Title: Up
Overview: A 78-year-old man ties thousands of balloons to his house and flies away, accidentally bringing a young Wilderness Explorer with him.

Title: Avatar
Overview: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission but becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

Title: Fight Club
Overview: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club.

Title: Amélie
Overview: A shy waitress in Paris decides to change the lives of those around her for the better while struggling with her own isolation.

Title: Alien
Overview: The crew of a commercial space tug investigates a mysterious signal on a remote planet and encounters a lethal extraterrestrial lifeform.

Title: Jaws
Overview: A police chief, a marine scientist, and an old seafarer try to hunt a massive great white shark terrorizing a beach resort.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Title: Goodfellas
Overview: The rise and fall of mob associate Henry Hill and his friends over three decades.

Title: Pan's Labyrinth
Overview: In 1944 Fascist Spain, a young girl, fascinated with fairy tales, finds a magical labyrinth and meets a faun who sets her on three tasks.

Title: The King's Speech
Overview: The story of King George VI, who, with the help of a speech therapist, overcomes his stammer to make an important radio address.

Title: V for Vendetta
Overview: In a dystopian future, a masked freedom fighter tries to ignite a revolution against a totalitarian society.

Title: Moonlight
Overview: A look at the life of a young black man from childhood to adulthood as he struggles to find his identity and sexuality.

Title: The Hurt Locker
Overview: A new staff sergeant takes over a bomb disposal team in Iraq, where his reckless approach to work puts his men at risk.

Title: WALL-E
Overview: In a future where Earth is uninhabitable, a garbage-collecting robot falls in love with a sleek search robot and pursues her across the galaxy.

Title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Overview: A man undergoes a procedure to erase the memories of his ex-girlfriend after their painful breakup.

Title: Django Unchained
Overview: A freed slave teams up with a German bounty hunter to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

Title: The Big Lebowski
Overview: An L.A. slacker is mistaken for a millionaire, leading to a complex scheme involving a trophy wife and a kidnapping plot.

Title: Donnie Darko
Overview: A troubled teenager is haunted by a giant rabbit who manipulates him into committing a series of crimes.

Title: Memories of Murder
Overview: Two South Korean detectives struggle to solve a series of brutal, unsolved murders in a rural province in the late 1980s.

Title: Oldboy
Overview: A man is locked in a room for 15 years without explanation and, upon his release, is given five days to find his captor.

Title: Inglourious Basterds
Overview: A group of Jewish-American soldiers are tasked with assassinating Nazi leaders in France during World War II.

Title: The Prestige
Overview: Rival magicians in London engage in a competitive battle for the best stage illusion, with dangerous consequences.

Title: The Aviator
Overview: A look at the life of movie mogul and aviator Howard Hughes, from the late 1920s to the mid-1940s.

Title: Brokeback Mountain
Overview: The decades-long secret relationship between two cowboys, who meet while working as sheep herders.

Title: Lost in Translation
Overview: A fading movie star and a lonely newlywed form an unlikely bond while in Tokyo.

Title: Zodiac
Overview: A cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer in San Francisco.

Title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
Overview: A man is born in his 80s and ages backward, navigating the world and his love for a woman who ages normally.

Title: The Tree of Life
Overview: A story of a Texas family in the 1950s, following the life journey of the eldest son, Jack, through the struggle of innocence and experience.

Title: A Separation
Overview: An Iranian couple faces a difficult decision regarding the care of a parent with Alzheimer's and the possibility of immigrating.

Title: Amour
Overview: An elderly couple, retired music teachers, are tested when the wife suffers a stroke.

Title: Nebraska
Overview: An aging, alcoholic father and his estranged son take a road trip to claim a million-dollar sweepstakes prize.

Title: Bridge of Spies
Overview: A lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange.

Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
Overview: The true story of New York stockbroker Jordan Belfort, his rise to a wealthy lifestyle, and subsequent downfall.

Title: Hacksaw Ridge
Overview: The story of Desmond Doss, a WWII American Army Medic who saved 75 men without carrying a weapon.

Title: The Handmaiden
Overview: A con man hires a pickpocket to pose as a maid to a Japanese heiress, but the plan takes an unexpected turn.

Title: Toni Erdmann
Overview: A father tries to reconnect with his estranged corporate daughter by creating an outrageous alter ego, Toni Erdmann.

Title: Roma
Overview: A year in the life of a middle-class family's maid in Mexico City in the early 1970s.

Title: Burning
Overview: A young man runs into a former classmate, who then introduces him to a mysterious, wealthy man with a strange hobby.

Title: Marriage Story
Overview: A look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

Title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
Overview: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the film industry during the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age.

Title: Minari
Overview: A Korean-American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of their own American Dream.

Title: Nomadland
Overview: Following the economic collapse of a town in rural Nevada, a woman packs her van and sets off on the road to explore a life outside of conventional society.

Title: The Father
Overview: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages, beginning to doubt his loved ones, his own mind, and even the fabric of his reality.

Title: Sound of Metal
Overview: A heavy-metal drummer's life is thrown into chaos when he begins to lose his hearing.

Title: Promising Young Woman
Overview: A woman, traumatized by a tragic event, sets out to exact revenge on predatory men.

Title: Dune
Overview: A gifted young man must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.

Title: CODA
Overview: As a Child of Deaf Adults, a high school student struggles to balance her passion for singing with her family's dependence on her.
